metadata.title: Docs revamped to Docusaurus
metadata.description: Our documentation has been revamped to Docusaurus (previously built with Docsify). This change was made to improve the overall experience of our users and contributors.

blogPosts.content: Our documentation has been revamped to Docusaurus (previously built with Docsify). This change was made to improve the overall experience of our users and contributors.

metadata.title: Chrome Debug Tool Release
metadata.description: A chrome debug tool was released on August 23, 2024. This tool helps you analyse the laravext data that is sent to the client. Check it out here.

blogPosts.content: A chrome debug tool was released on August 23, 2024. This tool helps you analyse the laravext data that is sent to the client. Check it out [here](/docs/tools/chrome-extension).

metadata.title: Laravext's first release
metadata.description: Laravext was officially released on August 20, 2024

blogPosts.content: Laravext was officially released on August 20, 2024
